CHAT.comment: Home Visit 1; took place in play room , Chi and Mot sat on floor , early evening

u.a: EXP brings out the toy bag and starts emptying out the toys
Chi helps take out the toys
Chi picks up the picnic blanket and starts to wrap up the stuffed toy in it
Chi hands EXP the note pad in the bag
Chi picks up a Fisher Price toy person
Chi continues to dump the toys out of the bag
MOT gets off her chair and sits on the floor with the toys
MOT begins to dial a number on the toy phone
Chi puts a toy person into the mini-van
Chi puts a piece into the puzzle
Chi starts to play with the van again
MOT and Chi put the toy bus aside
Chi hands one of the pieces to EXP
holds up a piece from the puzzle
Chi starts to put the piece in but it doesn't look like it will fit
MOT points out where the piece might go
Chi holds up another puzzle piece
EXP points out where the main piece goes
places the piece into the puzzle
puts a piece into the puzzle
MOT holds up a piece for Chi
traces the shape of the space in the puzzle
tries to put a piece into the puzzle
points out where the piece should go
puts the piece into the puzzle
9 second pause while Chi and Mot look for the right puzzle pieces
the piece did not fit where she tried to place it
Exp makes side comment . 12 second pause while Mot and Chi try to fit another piece into the puzzle
Chi tries to fit a piece into the wrong place
Chi puts it into the puzzle
11 second pause while Chi tries to fit a piece in place
6 second pause while Chi looks to see where the piece fits
MOT lines the piece up and helps Chi press it in place
Chi fits another piece into place
8 second pause while Chi and Mot try to fit the next piece into the puzzle
11 second pause while fitting the next piece in
figures out where the next piece goes
points to a space where the piece might fit
indicates where the piece should go
Chi is not able to put the piece in
Chi puts the piece on the puzzle but doesn't try to push it in
MOT pushes the piece into place
points to where she thinks the piece should fit
MOT points out the place to confirm Chi's choice
tries to put the piece in upside down
one piece of the puzzle is missing
bef picks a tea cup out of the toys
15 second pause while Chi picks out toys with which to play
starts to pull out Fisher Price people and toy blocks
pause as tape is turned over

CHAT.comment: MOT and Chi are playing with the blocks and are building an arch

u.a: MOT holds up a small green square block
Chi puts a block across the top of two blocks she had placed upright
places a triangular block underneath the arch
puts the Fisher Price people on the triangular block and knocks over the block on top of the arch
6 second pause while Chi tries to put it back up
12 second pause while Chi tries to rebuild the road and arch
puts the people on top of the arch
Chi is trying to put another block on top of the arch
10 seconds pause while Chi and Mot play with the blocks some more
MOT picks up the baby bottle and asks Chi what it is
8 second pause while Mot waits for Chi's response
18 second pause while Chi plays with the bottle
plays with the toy bottle for a while
suggests that Chi feed the bottle to the stuffed animals
Chi puts the stuffed animals on top of the blocks
Chi gets the stuffed animals to stay on top of the arch
13 seconds while Chi starts to get the tea set out
Chi places the tray on the floor upside down
9 second pause while Chi sorts the tea set
starts to give each person a cup
starts to resort them so the cups and saucers have matching colors
hands a cup and saucer to her mother
17 second pause while Chi and Mot play with the tea set
6 second pause while Chi puts the lid on the coffee pot
8 second pause while Chi tries to fit the lid on to the sugar bowl
9 second silence while Chi and Mot play
Chi pours out milk and then pours out more tea into her mother's cup
15 second pause as Mot pretends to fix a snack
MOT indicates that the spoon should go in the cup
hands Mot the spoon and fixes up the snack
lines the toy people onto the serving tray
points out where Chi left the other people on the floor
MOT looks for the other people
44 second pause while Chi finds the rest of the toy people and lines them up
10 second pause while Chi places the people back on the floor
the toy kettle makes a long whistling sound
presses the handle down on the kettle again and it makes another long whistling sound
pushes down the kettle a few more times and continues to talk to EXP about it
Chi starts to talk to EXP and show her the toys she has in the room . Mot lets her and they start picking up the toys
